Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that connects two students over a distance with a string telephone.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound to communicate information between the two students.
The student can show that the device has parts specifically designed to send or receive sounds.
The student can depict only the provided materials used in constructing the string telephone.
The student can demonstrate why communicating over a long distance with the device is useful.
The student can identify which features of their design make it a functioning communication device.
